duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations.
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">[Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 329 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 60-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>

</column>

---

You create a shimmering barrier that attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effects and planar travel into or out of the area, including items that allow access to [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) spaces (such as a [_bag of holding_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249)). _Dimensional lock_ tries to counteract any attempt to summon a creature into the area but doesn't stop the creature from departing when the summoning ends.
name: Dimensional Lock
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 329 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 60-foot burst

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Prevent teleportation and planar travel.
</summary>
text: Dimensional Lock Source Core Rulebook pg. 329 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Spell Lists Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 60-foot burst Duration until the next time you make your daily preparations. --- You create a shimmering barrier that attempts to counteract teleportation effects and planar travel into or out of the area, including items that allow access to extradimensional spaces (such as a bag of holding ). Dimensional lock tries to counteract any attempt to summon a creature into the area but doesn't stop the creature from departing when the summoning ends.
